about_the_game:
Dash & Swing - Demo

Swing, dash, and dodge your way through challenging levels in this addictive platformer game! With intuitive controls and a grappling hook mechanic, you'll guide your character through hazardous obstacles, enemies, and spikes. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

In Dash & Swing, players must use their acrobatic skills to navigate through a variety of obstacles and enemies to reach the end of each stage. With intuitive controls, you will need to time your moves and master the grappling hook to traverse the game's various challenges. Whether you're a casual gamer or a platforming enthusiast, this game offers a fun and exciting experience for all ages and skill levels.

Relax and Feel the Rhythm

Dash & Swing is a game that allows you to escape from day-to-day problems and instead focus on challenging levels while enjoying your favorite kind of music. Experience how the game reacts to the rhythm and beats as you play.

Import Your Own Playlist

Want to make the game even more personalized? You can import your own playlist and play the game while it dynamically reacts to your songs, creating a unique gaming experience tailored to your music.

Help Us Improve the Game

We value your feedback! Please visit our website and email us with any suggestions or comments you have. The community is an essential part of our game, and we want to build it together with you!

name: Dash & Swing Demo
short_description: A fast-paced action platformer, use your acrobatic skills to navigate through challenging levels. Swing and dash through a variety of obstacles to reach the end of each stage. With intuitive controls and thrilling gameplay, Dash & Swing offers an exciting experience for players who love platformers.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
